casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Samantha Renee EUBANKS, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158353, 158355
COA: 343714, 344193 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 7, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for immediate consideration and for stay of trial court proceedings is GRANTED. The proceedings in the Wayne Circuit Court are stayed pending completion of this appeal.

The application for leave to appeal the June 8, 2018 and July 16, 2018 orders of the Court of Appeals remains pending.
